Articles.Content: I have encountered this glitch wI think my maneuver nodes in all forms of the game.  If I create a node to be executed in one orbit or less I have no issues.  If I add additional orbits/time before the execution my maneuver nodes exponentially increase as long as I am focused on that particular ship.  Anyone else encounter this or have a fix?  I've tried just about everything aside from reinstalling the game. Thanks!
